sensor.descriptn: Battery voltage sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the battery voltage level. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
Speedometer sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the vehicle speed. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
EngineCoolant sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the Engine Coolant temperature. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
AutoOilChange sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the AutoOil change state. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PresentGear sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the Present gear value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TargetGear sensor. It has one channel, which returns the TargetGear value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
Odometer sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the Odometer value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
AvgFuelEcon sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the AvgFuelEcon value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
EngRPM sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the Engine RPM value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
ExteriorTemperature sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the Exterior Temperature value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
MilLampStat sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the Mil Lamp State. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
IgnOffTime sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the IgnOffTime value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PowerMode sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the PowerMode State. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
OilPressure sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the OilPressure value.
ABSIndLampStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the ABSIndLampStatus State.
TPMServiceWarningStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the TPMServiceWarningStatus State.
GlowPlugLampStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the GlowPlugLampStatus State.
ETCIndLampStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the ETCIndLampStatus State.
CHRGSystemFail sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the CHRGSystemFail State.
WashFluidLow sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the WashFluidLow State.
AirbagIndLamp sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the AirbagIndLamp State.
CheckFuelCap sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the CheckFuelCap State.
AvgFuelLevel sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the AvgFuelLevel value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TirePressFL sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the tire pressure value for front left.
TirePressFR sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the tire pressure value for front right.
TirePressRL sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the tire pressure value for rear left.
TirePressRR sensor is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the tire pressure value for rear right.
DpfDefWarningStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the DpfDefWarningStatus State.
ESCControlLamp sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the ESCControlLamp State.
BsmServiceRequest sensor. It has one channel, which returns the BsmServiceReqeust value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
DriverRecall sensor. It has one channel, which returns the DriverRecall value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TheftAlarm sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the TheftAlarm State.
Door sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the Door Lock State.
YawRate sensor. It has one channel, which returns the YawRate value.
Torque sensor. It has one channel, which returns the Torque value.
BrakePressure sensor. It has one channel, which returns the BrakePressure value.
SteeringWheelAngle sensor. It has one channel, which returns the SteeringWheelAngle value.
WheelPulse sensor. It has four channels, which returns the WheelPulse value.
LT_DIST sensor. It has one channel, which returns the distance traveled by left wheel value.
RT_DIST sensor. It has one channel, which returns the distance traveled by right wheel value.
ATMPressure sensor. It has one channel, which returns the ATMPressure value.
AverageTemp sensor. It has two channels, which returns the ATMPressure value.
IC_PP_RQ sensor. It has one channel, which returns the instrument cluster performace page request value.
BrakePedal sensor. It has one channel, which returns the BrakePedal value.
OILTempChime sensor. It has one channel, which returns the OILTempChime value.
IntakeAirTemp sensor. It has one channel, which returns the IntakeAirTemp value.
OilTemp sensor. It has one channel, which returns the Engine Oil Temp value.
WarningLightEvent sensor. It has one channel, which returns the WarningLightEvent value.
Day or Night Mode sensor. It has one channel, which returns the Day or Night mode value.
Door Ajar Status sensor. It has six channels, which returns the door ajars status for driver,passanger,left rear,right rear,flipper glass and trunk value.
IntakePressure sensor. It has one channel, which returns the IntakePressure value.
BrakeIndicationLampStatus sensor. It has one channel, which returns the BrakeIndicationLampStatus value.
EngineOilOverTemp sensor. It has one channel, which returns the EngineOilOverTemp value.
FilterWarningStatus sensor. It has one channel, which returns the FilterWarningStatus value.
BrakeFluid sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the Brake Fluid Low state.
TcaseLampStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the TcaseLampStatus state.
TransOverTemp sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the TransOverTemp state.
GlowPlugLampStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the GlowPlugLampStatus state.
WIFLampStatus sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the WIFLampStatus state.
DriverBelt sensor. It has one channel, which returns the DriverBelt value.
PassengerPresent sensor. It has one channel, which returns the PassengerPresent value.
PassengerBelt sensor. It has one channel, which returns the PassengerBelt value.
CANImpactEvent sensor. It has 15 channels, which returns the CANImpactEvent status value.
VehicleAcceleration sensor. It has 2 channels, which returns the VehicleAcceleration value.
Vehicle Acceleration Peak sensor. It has 2 channels, which returns the Vehicle Acceleration Peak value.
VehicleAccelerationOffsets sensor. It has 2 channels, which returns the Vehicle Acceleration Offset values.
SRT Present sensor. It has one channel, which returns the SRT Present status.
UConnectRequest sensor is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the diffrent modes of Uconnect .
PollingDurationOne is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationOne value.
PollingDurationTwo is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationTwo value.
PollingDurationThree is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationThree value.
PollingDurationFour is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationFour value.
PollingDurationFive is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationFive value.
PollingDurationSix is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationSix value.
PollingDurationSeven is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingDurationSeven value.
PollingIntervalOne is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalOne value.
PollingIntervalTwo is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalTwo value.
PollingIntervalThree is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalThree value.
PollingIntervalFour is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalFour value.
PollingIntervalFive is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalFive value.
PollingIntervalSix is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalSix value.
PollingIntervalSeven is a range based component. It has one channel, which returns the PollingIntervalSeven value.
StartTime1 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime1 value.
StartTime2 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime2 value.
StartTime3 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime3 value.
StartTime4 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime4 value.
StartTime5 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime5 value.
StartTime6 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime6 value.
StartTime7 sensor. It has one channel, which returns the StartTime7 value.
WakeupReason sensor. It has one channel, which returns the WakeupReason value.
Peak Acceleration in X direction
Peak Acceleration in Y direction
Speed in MPH indicator
Vehicle Speed
Vehicle Line
Vehicle Brand
Transmission Temp
Theme sensor. It has one channel, which returns the Theme ID value.
US_Metric is a state based component. It has one channel, which returns the US or Metric state.
Country Code sensor. It has one channel, which returns the Country Code.
PerformancePagesPresent sensor. It has one channel, which tells if the Performance Pages is Present. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
HillDescent sensor. It has one channel, which tells if the Hill descent feature is present[1]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
SelectSpeedControl sensor. It has one channel, which tells if the Select speed control feature is Present. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TransferCaseStatus sensor. It has one channel, which tells if the Transfer Case Status. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
ActualRearDifferentialTorqueLock sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Actual rear differential torque lock value. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TerrainModeStatus sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Terrain mode status. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
AirSuspensionStatus sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Air suspension status. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
HillDescentStatus sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Hill descent feature status. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
SelectSpeedStatus sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Select speed status. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PRNDL_Display_Request sensor. It has one channel, which tells the PRNDL display request. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
FrontLeftLevel sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Front left level. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
FrontRightLevel sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Front right level. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
RearLeftLevel sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Rear left level. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
RearRightLevel sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Rear right level. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PitchAngle sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Pitch angle. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
RollAngle sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Roll angle. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
Transmission type sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Transmission type where 0 = manual, 1 = automatic. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PanicAlarmActive sensor. It has one channel, which tells if the Panic Alarm is Active. 1 is True. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
DoorLockStatus sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Door Lock Status. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
StartType sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Type of start being requested. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
RemoteStartInhibit sensor. It has one channel, which tells the Remote start inhibit. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
RearLockLastElSts sensor. It has one channel, which tells the RearLockLastElSts state. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
DAS_RF_CHIME_RQSts sensor. It has one channel, which tells the AS right front chime on request.1 is True. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
ABSActive sensor. It has one channel, which tells if Any ABS brake event has occurred. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
HSA_BrkPrss sensor. It has one channel, which tells Hill start assist brake pressure. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
AccelPdlPosn_OBD sensor. It has one channel, which tells Throttle Pedal Position (Calculated). This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
IMPACTConfirm sensor. It has one channel, which tells Toggle bit for all impact events. actuate = [1] and do_not_actuate = [0]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
WashLightWarningSts sensor. It has one channel, which tells Low washer fluid warning .Value of 1 means Fluid is low. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
EPBHoldSts sensor. It has one channel, which tells Toggle bit for all impact events. actuate = [1] and do_not_actuate = [0]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
RechargeSts sensor. It has one channel. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
EngTrq_Rq_DAS sensor. It has one channel. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
DistanceUnit sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Distance (odometer) units. Miles = [1]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PowerUnit sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Power units. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
PressureUnit sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Pressure units. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
SpeedUnit sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Speed (speedometer) units. Miles = [1]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TemperatureUnit sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Temperature units. Farenheit = [1]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
TorqueUnit sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Torque units. Foot Pounds (ft-lb) = [1]. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
AirFuelRatio sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Air To fuel ratio. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
BoostVacGauge sensor. It has one channel which tells you the Gauge input for calculated boost/vacuum pressure. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
IntkAirTempIntrClr sensor. It has one channel which tells you Intake air temperature post intercooler. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
LTR_CoolantTemp sensor. It has one channel which tells you Low temp radiator (intercooler) coolant temperature. This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
AirPress_Outsd sensor. It has one channel which tells Ambient air pressure (barometric pressure). This sensor cannot be switched off and is always available.
